resp = client.connector.update_filtering(
    connector_id="my-g-drive-connector",
    rules=[
        {
            "field": "file_extension",
            "id": "exclude-txt-files",
            "order": 0,
            "policy": "exclude",
            "rule": "equals",
            "value": "txt"
        },
        {
            "field": "_",
            "id": "DEFAULT",
            "order": 1,
            "policy": "include",
            "rule": "regex",
            "value": ".*"
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)
